title: 7 longest living deep-sea creatures - DNA India
summary:
7 Longest Living Deep-Sea Creatures

Date: Dec 24, 2024

Source: DNA

Some of the oldest animals on Earth, famous for their unique lives can be found in the ocean. Here are the 7 water animals that live the longest.

  • Lobster: They can continuously repair their genetic material and slow down the aging process, living for over a century.
  • Tortoise: With a slow metabolism and a robust immune system, they can live for more than 100 years.
  • Bowhead whale: Known for living over 200 years, thanks to its strong immune system and Arctic habitat.
  • Turritopsis dohrnii (immortal jellyfish): Capable of reverting to its polyp stage when stressed, thereby avoiding death.
  • Greenland shark: Renowned for its longevity of up to 400 years, due to its cold-water habitat.
  • Red sea urchin: Lives more than 200 years, with a slow metabolism contributing to its lifespan.
  • Koi fish: Can live anywhere from 25 to 35 years, influenced by genetics and diet.
This information is not DNA's opinion but obtained from media reports.

This article highlights the remarkable longevity of various deep-sea creatures, showcasing the fascinating adaptations that allow them to thrive for decades or even centuries.
newTitle: 7 Longest Living Deep-Sea Creatures

title: Scan, share, done: WhatsApp update brings in-app scanning for iOS users - details - Mint
summary:
WhatsApp Introduces In-App Document Scanning for iOS Users

Publication Date: October 2023, Source: Live Mint

WhatsApp has launched an in-app scanning feature for iOS users, enhancing document sharing by allowing users to scan documents directly within the app.

Key Points

  • New in-app scanning feature is available in the latest WhatsApp update (version 24.25.80).
  • This feature allows users to scan documents without external tools.
  • Users can adjust scan margins for better quality.
  • The update is currently being rolled out to a select group of iOS users.
  • The feature aims to streamline document sharing for personal and professional use.
“The ability to scan and send documents directly within the instant messaging app removes the reliance on third-party scanning apps.”

This update is seen as a significant improvement in WhatsApp's document-sharing capabilities, making it a more comprehensive communication tool.

Vinod Kambli expressed gratitude towards his childhood friend Sachin Tendulkar after being hospitalized due to health complications. He highlighted the emotional support he received, particularly from his family and friends during this tough time.

  • Kambli was hospitalized after clots were found in his brain.

I am feeling better now...I will never leave this (cricket) because I remember the number of centuries and double centuries I have hit...I am thankful to Sachin Tendulkar as his blessings have always been with me.

Kambli continues to recover with the support of his family and medical team, illustrating the importance of community in overcoming health challenges.

title: Jaipur accident: How did LPG tanker driver survive fire that killed 13? - Hindustan Times
summary:
Jaipur LPG accident: How did tanker driver survive fire that killed 13?

Date: Dec 24, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The LPG tanker explosion on the Jaipur-Ajmer highway resulted in a tragic incident, killing 13 individuals. Thankfully, the driver managed to escape unharmed.

  • The explosion occurred after the tanker collided with a truck, leading to an extensive fire.
  • The driver, Jaiveer, recognized the danger when he noticed the damage to the tanker's nozzle.
  • Over 30 vehicles were engulfed in flames, and many individuals suffered severe burns.
  • Police have initiated an investigation into the incident, looking into potential negligence.
"We cannot blame the tanker driver immediately as the container truck driver had hit his vehicle," said Deputy Commissioner of Police (West) Amit Kumar.

This incident raises significant concerns about road safety and the transportation of hazardous materials.
newTitle: Survivor of Jaipur LPG Tanker Explosion: What Happened?

“Most heart diseases stem from unhealthy lifestyle choices.” — Dr. Praveen Chandra

title: PhD aspirant to OnlyFans model: Who is Zara Dar, influencer whose career choice sparked a debate? - Deccan Herald
summary:
Zara Dar: From PhD Aspirant to OnlyFans Model

Date: 24 December 2024 IST

Zara Dar, a former PhD student from Texas, has made headlines by leaving her academic path to pursue a full-time career as an OnlyFans model, igniting discussions about modern career choices in the digital age.

  • Dar is known for her YouTube channel where she simplifies complex scientific theories.
  • She expressed that her decision to leave PhD studies feels like a gamble but offers greater personal freedom.
  • Dar aims to combine science with personal content on her OnlyFans, differentiating her from typical adult content creators.
  • She plans to use her earnings to support STEM projects and scholarships, emphasizing her commitment to education and empowerment.
“It was a tough decision to leave something I’ve worked so hard for, but ultimately, this path allows me to be more creative and in control of my future.” - Zara Dar

title: 'I shouldn't have gone to the Olympics and won medals for the country': Manu Bhaker devastated by Khel Ratna axe - Hindustan Times
summary:
Manu Bhaker Heartbroken Over Khel Ratna Exclusion

Date: Dec 24, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Manu Bhaker, the celebrated shooter and twin medal winner at the Paris Olympics, is devastated after being excluded from the Rajiv Gandhi Khel Ratna award shortlist despite her historic achievements.

  • Manu Bhaker won two bronze medals at the Paris Olympics 2024, becoming the first Indian athlete of the Independence era to achieve this feat.
  • Despite being a strong candidate, she was not shortlisted for the Khel Ratna award.
  • Bhaker's father shared her disappointment, stating she felt she shouldn't have participated in the Olympics at all.
  • The sports ministry's decision has drawn backlash from fans and may prompt reconsideration.
  • She has a remarkable record of 17 gold, six silver, and five bronze medals in various shooting events since the Tokyo Games.
“I shouldn't have gone to the Olympics and won medals for the country. In fact, I shouldn't have become a sportsperson.” - Manu Bhaker

This exclusion has sparked significant discussion among sports fans and officials, potentially influencing future deliberations on recognition for athletes.
newTitle: Manu Bhaker Heartbroken Over Khel Ratna Exclusion

Delhi Police has uncovered an illegal immigration racket involving Bangladeshi nationals, leading to the arrest of 11 individuals in connection with the syndicate that manufactured fake documents.

  • Five Bangladeshi nationals were arrested in the operation.
  • Arrests included those accused of forging fake documents, including Aadhaar cards, PAN cards, and voter IDs.
  • The investigation followed the murder of Seton Sheikh, who was aiding illegal immigrants.
  • The organized network allegedly operates a website for document forgery.
  • The police are exploring potential electoral fraud related to the forged voter cards.
“The murder was motivated by financial disputes and personal grudges.”

The crackdown signifies significant efforts by Delhi Police to address illegal immigration and document forgery, with ongoing investigations for broader criminal connections.

title: CATL Unveils Chassis It Says Can Withstand Fires From Crashes | Company Business News - Mint
summary:
CATL Unveils Chassis It Says Can Withstand Fires From Crashes

Date: Unknown | Source: Bloomberg

Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. unveiled a new car chassis with an integrated battery designed to withstand fires or explosions from high-impact collisions.

  • The chassis can decouple from the car body and absorb energy from collisions up to 120 kms/hour.
  • Chinese EV brand Avatr is collaborating with CATL to develop cars based on this chassis.
  • The development aims to address consumer fears regarding EV battery fires.
  • CATL is expanding its offerings beyond batteries amidst slowing demand for pure-battery vehicles.
  • The company plans to roll out 1,000 battery swapping stations by the end of 2025.
The risk of EV battery fires, which are difficult to extinguish, is a detraction for some would-be buyers.

CATL's innovations aim to enhance EV adoption and reduce costs by addressing safety concerns.

title: NASA Warns Of Airplane-Sized Asteroid Set For Close Encounter With Earth This Week: Date, Time, Speed, Distanc - Times Now
summary:
NASA Warns Of Airplane-Sized Asteroid Set For Close Encounter With Earth This Week

Date: December 26, 2024

Source: Times Now

This week, NASA has detected a 95-foot asteroid, known as 2024 YH, which is on a trajectory that will bring it close to Earth at a safe distance of approximately 3,660,000 kilometers.

  • The asteroid will travel at a speed of 37,516 km/h.
  • Its closest approach to Earth is scheduled for 7:04 PM IST on December 26, 2024.
  • 2024 YH is not classified as a Potentially Hazardous Asteroid (PHA).
  • NASA continuously monitors near-Earth objects to assess potential risks.
“Circle December 26 on your calendars, as 2024 YH is going to be yet another celestial event to demonstrate how dynamic our universe really is.”

This close encounter presents no threat, but highlights the importance of tracking asteroid movements for Earth's safety.
newTitle: NASA Warns Of Airplane-Sized Asteroid Set For Close Encounter With Earth This Week

title: Day after Modi meeting with Catholic Bishops, a swipe from Kerala: ‘There they honour, here they destroy’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Day after Modi meeting with Catholic Bishops, a swipe from Kerala: ‘There they honour, here they destroy’

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

A day after Prime Minister Narendra Modi attended Christmas celebrations hosted by the Catholic Bishops Conference of India (CBCI) in Delhi, a senior Orthodox Church Bishop in Kerala criticized the event on social media, linking it to local incidents of disruption at Christmas celebrations in schools.

  • The Bishop of Malankara Orthodox Syrian Church, Yuhanon Meletius, made a statement on Facebook comparing the honor given to bishops in Delhi to the destruction of Christmas cribs in Kerala.
  • Recent disruptions at Christmas celebrations in Palakkad involve VHP leaders questioning the Christmas observances at a local government school.
  • A crib erected at a government school was reported vandalized, and police are investigating the incidents.
  • BJP leaders have been engaging with bishops in Kerala as part of a 'sneha yatra' to build community ties during Christmas.
  • BJP state president K Surendran claims the disruptions are part of a larger conspiracy to damage relations with the Christian community.
“There, they honour the bishops and revere the crib. Here, they destroy the cribs.”

The recent events have raised questions about the state of communal relations and the influence of political agendas during festive celebrations.
newTitle: Modi's Christmas Meeting Sparks Controversy in Kerala

title: ‘Pushpa 2 The Rule’ stampede: Producer of Allu Arjun mass entertainer donates ₹50 lakh to the victim’s fa - TOI Etimes
summary:
Producer of 'Pushpa 2' Donates ₹50 Lakh After Stampede Tragedy

Date: December 4, 2023Source: Times of India

The anticipatory excitement surrounding the premiere of 'Pushpa 2' turned tragic when a stampede occurred, resulting in the loss of a life and serious injuries to another.

  • The stampede happened at Sandhya Theatre in Hyderabad during the movie's early premiere on December 4th.
  • A woman lost her life in the chaos while her son was hospitalized with severe injuries.
  • The film's producer, Naveen Yerneni, has donated ₹50 lakh to the victim's family as a gesture of sympathy.
  • There were protests and vandalism at Allu Arjun’s residence following the incident.
“It's very unfortunate what happened. We've felt bad about it since it happened and we couldn't express our feelings. Revathi's death is a huge loss to her family,” said Naveen Yerneni.

This tragic event raises concerns about crowd management at film premieres and the responsibility of organizers for ensuring safety.
newTitle: Producer of 'Pushpa 2' Donates ₹50 Lakh After Stampede Tragedy

summary:
Driver of Gas Tanker Involved in Jaipur Blaze Survives and Speaks Out

Publication Date: December 24, 2024 Source: NDTV

Fourteen people have died and many more were injured in a massive blaze on the Jaipur-Ajmer highway ignited by a gas tanker accident.

  • The driver, identified as Jaiveer, escaped the fire by jumping from the tanker before a gas leak led to an explosion.
  • The accident occurred when the tanker made a U-turn and collided with a truck, causing a leak and subsequent blast.
  • Officials stated the stretch of highway is prone to accidents due to poor traffic management and construction activities.
  • Road safety experts point out hazardous conditions contributing to the accident including low visibility and inadequate signage.
  • Investigators are examining the tanker’s safety certifications and the circumstances surrounding the incident.
"The stretch of the Jaipur-Ajmer highway where the crash occurred is an accident-prone spot, with poor traffic management and ongoing construction creating hazardous conditions." - George Cheriyan, Road Safety Network

The tragic incident highlights safety concerns about road conditions and vehicle management, emphasizing the need for improved safety measures to prevent future accidents.
newTitle: Driver of Gas Tanker Involved in Jaipur Blaze Survives and Speaks Out

title: Asteroid alert: Massive asteroid to fly past Earth on christmas eve - News9 LIVE
summary:
Asteroid Alert: Massive Asteroid to Fly Past Earth on Christmas Eve

Date: Today | Source: Science News

Asteroid 2024 XN1, an Amor-type near-Earth object, will approach the Earth on Christmas Eve, flying at a distance of about 7.2 million kilometers. It offers a beautiful cosmic show rather than any imminent threat.

  • The asteroid was first observed in late November 2024.
  • Its trajectory suggests an orbital cycle of 2.34 years.
  • This asteroid is relatively small, ranging from 30 to 70 meters across.
  • Amateur astronomers may get a chance to observe it in clear skies on Christmas Eve.
  • Tracking such asteroids helps improve future asteroid encounter predictions and prevention technologies.
“... the Universe presents them with a spectacle of a visitor from space who is as ephemeral as the lights themselves.”

This event serves as a reminder of the importance of space missions and our ongoing need to monitor potential asteroid threats.
newTitle: Asteroid Alert: Massive Asteroid to Fly Past Earth on Christmas Eve
